short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Sends the selected URL to Meatloaf.cc for loading

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Links to retro computer media types are sent to meatloaf.cc and relayed to the Meatloaf device for direct load via HTTP.

Supports media types for Commodore, Atari, Apple, Tandy and many other 8bit computer systems.
